name: LabelOverlapMeasuresImageFilter

measurements.name: FalseNegativeError
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the false negative error for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: FalsePositiveError
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the false positive error for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: MeanOverlap
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the mean overlap (Dice coefficient) for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: UnionOverlap
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the union overlap (Jaccard coefficient) for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: VolumeSimilarity
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the volume similarity for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: JaccardCoefficient
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the union overlap (Jaccard coefficient) for the specified individual label.

measurements.name: DiceCoefficient
measurements.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the mean overlap (Dice coefficient) for the specified individual label.

briefdescription: Computes overlap measures between the set same set of labels of pixels of two images. Background is assumed to be 0.
detaileddescription:
This code was contributed in the Insight Journal paper: "Introducing Dice, Jaccard, and Other Label Overlap Measures To ITK" by Nicholas J. Tustison, James C. Gee https://hdl.handle.net/10380/3141 http://www.insight-journal.org/browse/publication/707 

\author Nicholas J. Tustison 

\see LabelOverlapMeasuresImageFilter
